content: owl materials g hook ww yarn i used simply soft in plum for the body and black pink and beige for the eyes felt glue body/head 6 single_crochet in ring rd1 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 12 single_crochet rd2 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet around 18 single_crochet rd3 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet around 24 single_crochet rd4 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 24 single_crochet rd5 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet around 30 single_crochet rd6 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet around 36 single_crochet rd7-11 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 36 single_crochet rd12 dec1sc over first 2 single_crochet single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet around 30 single_crochet rd13 dec1sc over first 2 single_crochet single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet around 24 single_crochet rd14-18 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 24 single_crochet rd19 2sc in first single_crochet single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet around 30 single_crochet rd20-23 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 30 single_crochet rd24 dec1sc over first 2 single_crochet single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet aeound 24 single_crochet rd25 dec1sc over first 2 single_crochet single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet around 18 single_crochet stuff owl here rd26 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 18 single_crochet rd27 dec1sc over first 2 single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet around 12 single_crochet rd28 dec1sc over first 2 single_crochet around 6 single_crochet fasten_off eyes make 2 4 single_crochet in ring with black rd1 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 8 single_crochet rd2 switch to pink 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet around 12 single_crochet rd3 switch to beige/white 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet around 16 single_crochet rd4 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet around 20 single_crochet fasten_off finishing sew or glue eyes to the head cut out a small triangle for the beak and glue in between eyes also cut out rounded triangles for the feet and sort of a heart shape for the wings i used orange felt for the feet and beak and black for the wings enjoy pattern written by gnathalie2
